title: Porno Studio Tycoon v0.1 [2017 / MULTI]
description:
TRAILER:

Porno Studio Tycoon PC Game Overview:

Porno Studio Tycoon is developed and published by Zitrix Megalomedia. It was released in 05 May, 2017.

Business simulator with no adult-world gravity. Flexible configuration of movies shot, casting actresses and shooting may turn out to be tricky job, markets with shortage and surplus, office with employees, websites with black hat SEO, other features. Information about the game world is a valuable resource (forget about ignoring it). High quality unique graphics.

Become a filmmaker

Shoot sneakily in public places or frighten your neighbors in rented apartments. Group actresses with similar skills and keep track of their mood. Choose the right plot actions. Upgrade your operator abilities on the set or learn from the books. Hire a crew with awesome director. Define the number of scenes in the film and the costs of postproduction.

100% business simulator

Film quality affects its price, but there will be no profit without buyers. Release the film, when competitors don’t expect you to. An analyst in the office can help you with it. By the way, your office is very useful. An experienced salesman can increase the sales in chosen country. A secretary can add some details to the reports. An accountant can tell you why you’re broke. If you’ve managed this crowd, it is time to create your own websites. And with black hat SEO it’s easier to monitor the number of subscribers.

Minimum:

OS: Windows 7,8,8.1,10 64/x86
Processor: 1.4 Ghz
Memory: 2 GB RAM
Graphics: DirectX 10 Compatible Graphics Card
DirectX: Version 10
Storage: 1 GB available space
